span.b: Emergency school closure currently in effect. Staff and learners tentatively return to school on Monday, April 20, 2020. Check back frequently for updates.The health and wellness of our school communities is a top priority at PCSD 25.

p.span: As you know, there are growing concerns about the spread of the coronavirus. Our goal is to keep you informed about the virus and the steps you can take to stay healthy. PCSD 25 works in partnership with the Southeast Idaho Public Health Department, as well as the State Department of Education to closely monitor any situation that deals with public health that may impact our local schools.

We are paying very close attention to the latest news regarding the Coronavirus and any information being circulated by various entities, including the Idaho Department of Health and Welfare and the Idaho Department of Education. Although the severity of the coronavirus outbreak is difficult to predict, we’re keeping in close contact with healthcare providers, state coronavirus response teams, and health agencies in the event that any cases are reported in our community.
Below are links to valuable information about the coronavirus and what can be done to help with stopping the spread of it.

a.span: CDC Frequently Asked Questions and Answers: Coronavirus Disease-2019 (COVID-19) and Children

p.span: We will continue to work in collaboration with all public health officials in our region to provide guidance, promote awareness, and respond appropriately in the event this infection is confirmed in our community. You can click any of the documents below for more information.

img.alt: Stop the spread of germs info graph.

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,
